title: Shadow Lantern
content:
0.9 190

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d6 (1d4) Bludgeoning

Conjure Shadow Lantern Wraith: Pull an undead creature from the depths of the Shadow Lantern's depraved magic to join your side in combat. Can be cast once per Long Rest.

Encased in a cocoon of shadow within the lantern, the mangled pixie lies like some deformed pupa, its mouth slack, and those same shadows crawling over its graying tongue.

Club Light Versatile

Shadow Lantern is one of the Club Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3.
